Title: Main, Meri Patni... Aur Woh!
Writer: Gunjan Joshi (story), Rajpal Yadav (story), Ashok Khanna (screenplay), Pankaj Saraswat (screenplay), Pankaj Saraswat (dialogue)
Actors: Rajpal Yadav, Rituparna Sengupta, Naseeruddin Shah, Kay Kay Menon
Plot: A short, nondescript man, Mithilesh Shukla marries a tall and beautiful woman. Now jealousy and Mithilesh's own insecurities threaten to wreck his happy home.
